1. **Open the file:** "C:\Users\**%USERNAME%**\AppData\Roaming\Fatshark\Vermintide 2\console_logs\console-###.log
2. Copy data from file to [Pastebin.com](https://pastebin.com/)
3. Paste link in bug report

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Do something else '....'
4. See error
